bibliography:

Philosophia, 43: 759–785.

447–73.

569–97.

Flint, T. and Freddoso, A., 1983, “Maximal Power,” in

Beings?” Philosophia, 43: 309–324.

Frankfurt, H., 1977, “Descartes on the Creation of the
Eternal Truths,” Philosophical Review, 86:
36–57.

Gellman, Jerome I., 1989, “The Limits of Maximal

Hill, D. J., 2005,  Divinity and Maximal Greatness,
London: Routledge.

Hoffman, J., 1979, “Can God Do Evil?,” Southern

Hoffman, J., and Rosenkrantz, G. S., 1988, “Omnipotence

–––, 2002, The Divine Attributes,
Oxford: Blackwell.

–––, 2010, “Omnipotence” in A

Kenny, A., 1979,  The God of the Philosophers, Oxford:
Clarendon Press.

Leftow, Brian, 2009, “Omnipotence” in The Oxford

Loke, Andrew, 2010, “Divine Omnipotence and Moral

Maimonides, Guide for the Perplexed, trans. M.
Friedlander, London: George Routledge and Sons, 1904.

Mele, A. and Smith, M. P., 1998, “The New Paradox of the

Morris, T. V., 1991, Our Idea of God, South Bend:

Morriston, Wes, 2001, “Omnipotence and Necessary Moral

Oppy, Graham, 2005, “Omnipotence,” Philosophy and

Plantinga, A., 1974, God, Freedom, and Evil, New York:

Wierenga, E., 1989, The Nature of God: An Inquiry into Divine
